roleset.name: to come together
roleset.note: CONGREGATE-V NOTES: Arg 0 is probably infrequent. (from congregate.01-v)
CONGREGATION-N NOTES: Based on ontonotes nouns. Comparision to congregate.01. Congregate.01 is a member of Vn class herd-47.5.2. Framed by Katie. (from congregation.01-n)

example.name: intransitive
example.text: The bustling shopping district where-1 foreigners congregated in the days of the foreign concessions *T* -1.
example.arg: in the days of the foreign concessions

example.name: arg 1
example.text: The most important congregation of the Deaf community
